questions.question: Which of these career choices describe you?

options.option: Make a lot of money working from home, I'm a Freelancer by heart.
Choosing Strong growing Startup over large-sized MNC.
Choosing MNC over medium-sized startup.
Become an entrepreneur, I'm my own boss.
Start as an intern, as I'm a recent graduate and zero work experience.

questions.question: Which sort of organizational structure do you see yourself comfortable in?

options.option: Small- sized startup with no particular organizational structure.
Medium-sized company with hierarchical organizational structure.
Medium-sized company with flat hierarchical organizational structure.
Large-sized MNCs with any hierarchical structure

questions.question: What language do you like to hear at work?

options.option: Strictly English
I love to hear and learn foreign languages
Only my mother tongue
Language doesn’t bother my work, I'm a loner and don’t speak much!!

questions.question: Which type of team you wish to work in?

options.option: Everybody is from my country.
Mostly Multi-Cultural.
Everyone should be from different countries.
Only team your boyfriend/ girlfriend work for.

questions.question: What type of qualities you wish to see in your colleagues?

options.option: Fun-loving, Flexible and Loose
Humble and Super-nice
Professionally fit and always exist to help
All of the above, Why not?
Feel advantageous with a group.
Individually, as I’m shy to do this with a group.
I'm a Geek and I do share ideas only on collaborative network (like emails) or office channels.
I don’t like the idea of brainstorming.

questions.question: In which part of day, you prefer to have a brainstorming session?

options.option: Beginning of the day.
During lunch hour.
End of the day.
Flexible, i.e., Okay with any part of the day.

questions.question: How do you wish your average work day looks like?

options.option: Start with a coffee, have good lunch and end the day with a drink.
Know your daily to-do(s), Stay focused and finish the task by committing your bug free code.
Work for major part of the day and gossiping with your team members in break time.
Know your daily to-do(s), live up to the challenges of work and finish daily tasks successfully but forget to commit the code at the end.

questions.question: Which of these will make your day at work?

options.option: My Manager's appreciation.
Finishing days’ work in time and leaving the office early.
Getting your favorite dish for lunch.
The day when Project is successfully delivered to the client.
A smile from my office crush.

questions.question: Do you wish to learn new technologies, even after getting paid well?

options.option: Of course, Life is all about learning something new.
Yes, but only if my company pays for it.
Only if it hikes my position at work.
Brah!! I'm done learning things all my life.

questions.question: Everyone loves to greet their stomach during work, so which of these free snacks you love to see on your table?

options.option: All types of drinks, like coffee, tea, colas.
Only healthy snacks, as I'm on diet.
Anything sweet, I have a sweet tooth.
Everything that is tagged as food.
Thanks!! But I carry my own snacks, I'm a great cook.

questions.question: Which will make you happier about your work?

options.option: My Clients Happiness.
Self-happiness by committing my code at end of the day successfully.
If my work contributes towards Charity and Caritative organizations.
I can see myself equally happy in all the above three ways.
Make my Manager happy, who cares for Customers, Charity etc.

questions.question: How will you react if you are asked to work for extra hours or on a weekend?

options.option: Frustrated but attend the work.
Attend the work, only to impress the Boss.
Look it as a normal thing and stay committed towards work.
Happy to be at office and with my colleagues anytime.
Try to escape work somehow.
Resign the job.

questions.question: This goes personal; how would you like to spend your weekend?

options.option: Go for a movie, I'm a movie buff.
Loves to travel to new places with dear ones.
Stay at Home, watch Football and play games.
Spend time at loved one’s place.
Stay calm and wait for Monday.
Re-visiting the classic YouTube videos you bookmark online.
Sharing random links with the guy in the office next to you.
